name: validator.js
description: 轻量级JavaScript表单验证，字符串验证。

scripts.build:min: umd Validator src/validator.js | uglifyjs -mc | bannerjs -o > dist/validator.min.js
scripts.build:dist: umd Validator src/validator.js | uglifyjs -b beautify=true --comments 'all' | bannerjs -m > dist/validator.js
scripts.build: npm run build:min && npm run build:dist

author: LMY
